recipe.title: Ultra-Rich Hot Chocolate
ingredients: 4 ounces bittersweet (not unsweetened) or semisweet chocolate, chopped
instructions: Bring milk, cocoa powder and sugar to simmer in heavy large saucepan over medium-high heat, whisking frequently. Add chocolate; whisk until melted and smooth. Add salt; bring to simmer, whisking constantly until frothy. Ladle into 4 mugs. Sprinkle with marshmallows.
